Author: miniOrange Inc.
Description: miniOrange Single Sign On (SSO) plugin allows SSO with Azure AD, Azure AD B2C, Keycloak, ADFS, Okta, Shibboleth, Salesforce, GSuite or Google Apps, Office 365, SimpleSAMLphp, OpenAM, Centrify, Ping, RSA, IBM, Oracle, OneLogin, Bitium, WSO2, NetIQ and all SAML 2.0 capable Identity Providers into your nopCommerce store.
